name: Hotel Horror!
description:
Hotel Horror is a quick-thinking local co-op puzzle game for 1 - 4 players, where you must work together to solve each room and  keep your home safe!

YOU embody a crew of Ghosts, hell-bent to protect their rightful haunted territory from an incoming invasion of crusty corporal creatures... named Humans!

By possessing furniture, Ghosts will wait for the right moment to strike, and… BOO! The Human shrieks in terror, their nerves on edge. Enough successful spooks, and that Human might just give-up and leave. But watch out, if you’re too slow the Human will eventually unpack all their stuff, and you’ll have to move out!

This game is in development and currently local-multiplayer only.  
Input: Keyboard and/or Gamepad.

TIPS:

  •  The first scene is the "player select" lobby.  Once player amount is selected and you've moved your ghosts around, click the "ready" graphic to start the game!
  • On tutorial texts, press space to advance.

! KNOWN BUGS !

  • currently none! If you find a bug, please let us know!
